title: How Does the Hall of Fame Help Us Understand Basketball History? | The Answer
description:
With the 2021 Naismith Basketball Hall of Fame inductions this weekend, Chris and Seerat discuss how the hall explains basketball history.

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Seerat Sohi
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
